Follow

A list of people, companies, and meetup groups to follow in web standards and accessibility.

Who and what to follow

Joe Watkins maintains a list of notable people, companies and organizations, and meetups that contribute to web accessibility and standards.

Follow The A11Y Project

You can follow The A11Y Project on Twitter. We also have a RSS feed to keep track of when we publish new posts.
